slide.title: Deploying PHP/APC Apps
slide.blurb: Slightly trickier. Most often solved by having a current symlink that points to a release directory. When a new release is uploaded to the server, the symlink is moved when all the files are in place.
If you have a CDN, or don't delete static assets and you manage your caches appropriately, you can get away with rsync'ing the files into place.
